alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 04 at 11:43AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is likely. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.2 feet next Saturday morning, which will be highly dependent on receiving significant rainfall through the week. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.2 feet on 07/03/1998. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.9 Sun 11 am MD 3.9 4.1 3.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
